channel.title: Projects on Managed Services Status - Mad Scientist Technologies

item.title: DMARC Implementation Project
item.description: Project Status: In Progress (Partially Completed) Client Domains: Current: Monitoring DMARC Reports Changing: April 15-20 Monitoring + Quartintine Goal/Additional Information The Implementation of DMARC Standard/Records (DMARC, DKIM, SPF) for all email messaging services managed by Mad Scientist Technologies. Additional information about DMARC, DKIM, and SPF can be found on the original project page. Questions about this project, contact us. Project Time Last Updated: April 2024 Managed Domains - Clients SPF/DKIM Status Completed/Fully Implemented DMARC Status Records Implemented Status: Monitoring Message Percentage: 100% Disposition on Failing Messages: None We will start moving managed domains to the next step, Quarantine, during the month of April 2024.
